org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration

Class CartesianLinearAxis

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.ChartContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.ConfigurationContainer<ExtendedScale>
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.Axis
          • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.CartesianAxis<CartesianLinearTick>
            • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.CartesianLinearAxis
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IsLinearAxis, IsNumericAxis

    public class CartesianLinearAxis
extends CartesianAxis<CartesianLinearTick>
implements IsLinearAxis
    This object is used to map defined axis as linear.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Axis getAxisElement()
      Returns the axis instance.
      int getGrace()
      Returns the value in pixels is added to the maximum data value and subtracted from the minimum data.
      This extends the scale range as if the data values were that much greater.
      String getGraceAsPercentage()
      Returns the value in percentage is added to the maximum data value and subtracted from the minimum data.
      This extends the scale range as if the data values were that much greater.

      Returns the ticks element
